00066 // ATE: Globals that dictate where the mercs will land once being hired

00070 INT16 gsMercArriveSectorY = 1;

00075 INT8 HireMerc( MERC_HIRE_STRUCT *pHireMerc)
00076 {
00077       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00078       UINT8       iNewIndex;
00079       UINT8       ubCount=0;
00080       UINT8       ubCurrentSoldier = pHireMerc->ubProfileID;
00081       MERCPROFILESTRUCT                   *pMerc;
00082       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT          MercCreateStruct;
00083       BOOLEAN fReturn = FALSE;
00084       pMerc = &gMercProfiles[ ubCurrentSoldier ];
00085 
00086       //If we are to disregard the ststus of the merc
00087       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00088             if( !gForceHireMerc )
00089       #endif
00090       //If the merc is away, Dont hire him, or if the merc is only slightly annoyed at the player
00091       if( ( pMerc->bMercStatus != 0 ) && (pMerc->bMercStatus != MERC_ANNOYED_BUT_CAN_STILL_CONTACT ) && ( pMerc->bMercStatus != MERC_HIRED_BUT_NOT_ARRIVED_YET ) )
00092             return( MERC_HIRE_FAILED );
00093 
00094       if( NumberOfMercsOnPlayerTeam() >= 18 )
00095             return( MERC_HIRE_OVER_20_MERCS_HIRED );
00096 
00097       // ATE: if we are to use landing zone, update to latest value
00098       // they will be updated again just before arrival...
00099       if ( pHireMerc->fUseLandingZoneForArrival )
00100       {
00101             pHireMerc->sSectorX     = gsMercArriveSectorX;
00102             pHireMerc->sSectorY     = gsMercArriveSectorY;
00103             pHireMerc->bSectorZ     = 0;
00104       }
00105 
00106       // BUILD STRUCTURES
00107       memset( &MercCreateStruct, 0, sizeof( MercCreateStruct ) );
00108       MercCreateStruct.ubProfile                                  = ubCurrentSoldier;
00109       MercCreateStruct.fPlayerMerc                          = TRUE;
00110       MercCreateStruct.sSectorX                                         = pHireMerc->sSectorX;
00111       MercCreateStruct.sSectorY                                         = pHireMerc->sSectorY;
00112       MercCreateStruct.bSectorZ                                         = pHireMerc->bSectorZ;
00113       MercCreateStruct.bTeam                                            = SOLDIER_CREATE_AUTO_TEAM;
00114       MercCreateStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver= pHireMerc->fCopyProfileItemsOver;
00115 
00116       if ( !TacticalCreateSoldier( &MercCreateStruct, &iNewIndex ) )
00117       {
00118             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "TacticalCreateSoldier in HireMerc():  Failed to Add Merc");
00119             return( MERC_HIRE_FAILED );
00120       }
00121 
00122       if( DidGameJustStart() )
00123       {
00124             // OK, CHECK FOR FIRST GUY, GIVE HIM SPECIAL ITEM!
00125             if ( iNewIndex == 0 )
00126             {
00127                   // OK, give this item to our merc!
00128                   OBJECTTYPE Object;
00129             
00130                   // make an objecttype
00131                   memset( &Object, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
00132                   Object.usItem                                   = LETTER;
00133                   Object.ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
00134                   Object.bStatus[0]                   = 100;
00135                   // Give it 
00136                   fReturn = AutoPlaceObject( MercPtrs[iNewIndex], &Object, FALSE );
00137                   Assert( fReturn );
00138             }
00139 
00140             // Set insertion for first time in chopper
00141 
00142             // ATE: Insert for demo , not using the heli sequence....
00143             pHireMerc->ubInsertionCode                      = INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER;
00144       }
00145 
00146 
00147       //record how long the merc will be gone for
00148       pMerc->bMercStatus = (UINT8)pHireMerc->iTotalContractLength;
00149 
00150       pSoldier = &Menptr[iNewIndex];
00151 
00152       //Copy over insertion data....
00153       pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = pHireMerc->ubInsertionCode;
00154       pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = pHireMerc->usInsertionData;
00155       // ATE: Copy over value for using alnding zone to soldier type
00156       pSoldier->fUseLandingZoneForArrival = pHireMerc->fUseLandingZoneForArrival;
00157 
00158 
00159       // Set assignment
00160       //ATE: If first time, make ON_DUTY, otherwise GUARD
00161       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT ) )
00162       {
00163             SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
00164       }
00165       ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, IN_TRANSIT );
00166 
00167       //set the contract length
00168       pSoldier->iTotalContractLength = pHireMerc->iTotalContractLength;
00169 
00170       //reset the insurance values
00171       pSoldier->iStartOfInsuranceContract = 0;
00172       pSoldier->iTotalLengthOfInsuranceContract = 0;
00173 
00174       //Init the contract charge
00175 //    pSoldier->iTotalContractCharge = 0;
00176 
00177       // store arrival time in soldier structure so map screen can display it
00178       pSoldier->uiTimeSoldierWillArrive = pHireMerc->uiTimeTillMercArrives;
00179 
00180 
00181       //Set the type of merc
00182 
00183       if( DidGameJustStart() )
00184       {
00185             // Set time of initial merc arrival in minutes
00186             pHireMerc->uiTimeTillMercArrives = ( STARTING_TIME + FIRST_ARRIVAL_DELAY ) / NUM_SEC_IN_MIN;
00187 
00188             // Set insertion for first time in chopper
00189             pHireMerc->ubInsertionCode                      = INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER;
00190 
00191             //set when the merc's contract is finished
00192             pSoldier->iEndofContractTime = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( pSoldier->iTotalContractLength ) + ( GetHourWhenContractDone( pSoldier ) * 60 );
00193       }
00194       else
00195       {
00196             //set when the merc's contract is finished ( + 1 cause it takes a day for the merc to arrive )
00197             pSoldier->iEndofContractTime = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( 1 + pSoldier->iTotalContractLength ) + ( GetHourWhenContractDone( pSoldier ) * 60 );
00198       }
00199 
00200       //Set the time and ID of the last hired merc will arrive
00201       LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc = pHireMerc->ubProfileID;
00202       LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.uiArrivalTime = pHireMerc->uiTimeTillMercArrives;
00203 
00204 
00205       //if we are trying to hire a merc that should arrive later, put the merc in the queue
00206       if( pHireMerc->uiTimeTillMercArrives  != 0 )
00207       {
00208             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_DELAYED_HIRING_OF_MERC, pHireMerc->uiTimeTillMercArrives,  pSoldier->ubID );
00209 
00210             //specify that the merc is hired but hasnt arrived yet
00211             pMerc->bMercStatus = MERC_HIRED_BUT_NOT_ARRIVED_YET;
00212 
00213       }
00214 
00215 
00216       //if the merc is an AIM merc
00217       if( ubCurrentSoldier < 40 )
00218       {
00219 
00220             pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI = MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC;
00221             //determine how much the contract is, and remember what type of contract he got
00222             if( pHireMerc->iTotalContractLength == 1 )
00223             {
00224                   //pSoldier->iTotalContractCharge = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
00225                   pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract = CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_DAY;
00226       pSoldier->iTimeCanSignElsewhere = GetWorldTotalMin();
00227             }
00228             else if( pHireMerc->iTotalContractLength == 7 )
00229             {
00230                   //pSoldier->iTotalContractCharge = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiWeeklySalary;
00231                   pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract = CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_WEEK;
00232       pSoldier->iTimeCanSignElsewhere = GetWorldTotalMin();
00233             }
00234             else if( pHireMerc->iTotalContractLength == 14 )
00235             {
00236                   //pSoldier->iTotalContractCharge = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiBiWeeklySalary;
00237                   pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract = CONTRACT_EXTEND_2_WEEK;
00238       // These luck fellows need to stay the whole duration!
00239       pSoldier->iTimeCanSignElsewhere = pSoldier->iEndofContractTime;
00240             }
00241 
00242             // remember the medical deposit we PAID.  The one in his profile can increase when he levels!
00243             pSoldier->usMedicalDeposit = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sMedicalDepositAmount;
00244       }
00245       //if the merc is from M.E.R.C.
00246       else if( ( ubCurrentSoldier >= BIFF && ubCurrentSoldier <= BUBBA ) || ubCurrentSoldier >= GASTON ) 
00247       {
00248             pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI = MERC_TYPE__MERC;
00249             //pSoldier->iTotalContractCharge = -1;
00250 
00251             gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].iMercMercContractLength = 1;
00252 
00253             //Set starting conditions for the merc
00254             pSoldier->iStartContractTime = GetWorldDay( );
00255 
00256             AddHistoryToPlayersLog(HISTORY_HIRED_MERC_FROM_MERC, ubCurrentSoldier, GetWorldTotalMin(), -1, -1 );
00257       }
00258       //If the merc is from IMP, (ie a player character)
00259       else if( ( ubCurrentSoldier >= 51 ) && ( ubCurrentSoldier < 57 ) ) 
00260       {
00261             pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI = MERC_TYPE__PLAYER_CHARACTER;
00262             //pSoldier->iTotalContractCharge = -1;
00263       }
00264       //else its a NPC merc
00265       else
00266       {
00267             pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI = MERC_TYPE__NPC;
00268             //pSoldier->iTotalContractCharge = -1;
00269       }
00270 
00271       //remove the merc from the Personnel screens departed list ( if they have never been hired before, its ok to call it )
00272       RemoveNewlyHiredMercFromPersonnelDepartedList( pSoldier->ubProfile );
00273 
00274       gfAtLeastOneMercWasHired = TRUE;
00275       return( MERC_HIRE_OK );
00276 }

00278 
00279 void MercArrivesCallback(     UINT8 ubSoldierID )
00280 {
00281       MERCPROFILESTRUCT                   *pMerc;
00282       SOLDIERTYPE                                     *pSoldier;
00283       UINT32                                                      uiTimeOfPost;
00284 
00285       if( !DidGameJustStart() && gsMercArriveSectorX == 9 && gsMercArriveSectorY == 1 )
00286       { //Mercs arriving in A9.  This sector has been deemed as the always safe sector.
00287             //Seeing we don't support entry into a hostile sector (except for the beginning),
00288             //we will nuke any enemies in this sector first.
00289             if( gWorldSectorX != 9 || gWorldSectorY != 1 || gbWorldSectorZ )
00290             {
00291                   EliminateAllEnemies( (UINT8)gsMercArriveSectorX, (UINT8)gsMercArriveSectorY );
00292             }
00293       }
00294 
00295       // This will update ANY soldiers currently schedules to arrive too
00296       CheckForValidArrivalSector( );
00297 
00298       // stop time compression until player restarts it
00299       StopTimeCompression();
00300 
00301       pSoldier = &Menptr[ ubSoldierID ];
00302 
00303       pMerc = &gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ];
00304 
00305       // add the guy to a squad
00306       AddCharacterToAnySquad( pSoldier );
00307 
00308       // ATE: Make sure we use global.....
00309       if ( pSoldier->fUseLandingZoneForArrival )
00310       {
00311             pSoldier->sSectorX      = gsMercArriveSectorX;
00312             pSoldier->sSectorY      = gsMercArriveSectorY;
00313             pSoldier->bSectorZ      = 0;
00314       }
00315 
00316       // Add merc to sector ( if it's the current one )
00317       if ( gWorldSectorX == pSoldier->sSectorX && gWorldSectorY == pSoldier->sSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
00318       {
00319             // OK, If this sector is currently loaded, and guy does not have CHOPPER insertion code....
00320             // ( which means we are at beginning of game if so ) 
00321             // Setup chopper....
00322             if ( pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode != INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER && pSoldier->sSectorX == 9 && pSoldier->sSectorY == 1 )
00323             {
00324                   gfTacticalDoHeliRun = TRUE;
00325 
00326                   // OK, If we are in mapscreen, get out...
00327                   if ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
00328                   {
00329         // ATE: Make sure the current one is selected!
00330                         ChangeSelectedMapSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, 0 );
00331 
00332                         RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_TACTICAL );
00333                   }
00334 
00335                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER;
00336             }
00337 
00338             UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
00339       }
00340       else
00341       {
00342             // OK, otherwise, set them in north area, so once we load again, they are here.
00343             pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
00344       }
00345 
00346       if ( pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode != INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER )
00347       {
00348             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MERC_HAS_ARRIVED_STR ], pSoldier->name );
00349 
00350             // ATE: He's going to say something, now that they've arrived...
00351             if ( gTacticalStatus.bMercArrivingQuoteBeingUsed == FALSE && !gfFirstHeliRun )
00352             {
00353                   gTacticalStatus.bMercArrivingQuoteBeingUsed = TRUE;
00354 
00355                   //Setup the highlight sector value (note this isn't for mines but using same system)
00356                   gsSectorLocatorX = pSoldier->sSectorX;
00357                   gsSectorLocatorY = pSoldier->sSectorY;
00358 
00359                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_MINESECTOREVENT, 2, 0 );
00360                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_MERC_REACHED_DESTINATION );
00361                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_MINESECTOREVENT, 3, 0 );
00362                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEventEx( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_UNSET_ARRIVES_FLAG, 0, 0, 0 );
00363             }
00364       }
00365 
00366       //record how long the merc will be gone for
00367       pMerc->bMercStatus = (UINT8)pSoldier->iTotalContractLength;
00368 
00369       // remember when excatly he ARRIVED in Arulco, in case he gets fired early
00370       pSoldier->uiTimeOfLastContractUpdate = GetWorldTotalMin();
00371 
00372       //set when the merc's contract is finished 
00373       pSoldier->iEndofContractTime = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( pSoldier->iTotalContractLength ) + ( GetHourWhenContractDone( pSoldier ) * 60 );
00374 
00375       // Do initial check for bad items
00376       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00377       {
00378             //ATE: Try to see if our equipment sucks!
00379             if ( SoldierHasWorseEquipmentThanUsedTo( pSoldier ) )
00380             {
00381                   // Randomly anytime between 9:00, and 10:00
00382                   uiTimeOfPost =  540 + Random( 660 );
00383 
00384                   if ( GetWorldMinutesInDay() < uiTimeOfPost )
00385                   {
00386                         AddSameDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_MERC_COMPLAIN_EQUIPMENT, uiTimeOfPost , pSoldier->ubProfile );
00387                   }
00388             }
00389       }
00390 
00391       HandleMercArrivesQuotes( pSoldier );
00392 
00393       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00394 
00395       // if the currently selected sector has no one in it, select this one instead
00396       if ( !CanGoToTacticalInSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( UINT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
00397       {
00398             ChangeSelectedMapSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, 0 );
00399       }
00400 
00401       return;
00402 }
00403 
00404 
00405 BOOLEAN IsMercHireable( UINT8 ubMercID )
00406 {
00407       //If the merc has an .EDT file, is not away on assignment, and isnt already hired (but not arrived yet), he is not DEAD and he isnt returning home
00408       if( ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_HAS_NO_TEXT_FILE ) || 
00409                   ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus > 0 ) || 
00410                   ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_HIRED_BUT_NOT_ARRIVED_YET ) || 
00411                   ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_IS_DEAD ) ||
00412                   ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].uiDayBecomesAvailable > 0 ) ||
00413                   ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_WORKING_ELSEWHERE ) ||
00414                   ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_FIRED_AS_A_POW ) ||
00415                   ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_RETURNING_HOME ) )
00416             return(FALSE);
00417       else
00418             return(TRUE);
00419 }
00420 
00421 BOOLEAN IsMercDead( UINT8 ubMercID )
00422 {
00423       if( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_IS_DEAD )
00424             return(TRUE);
00425       else
00426             return(FALSE);
00427 }
00428 
00429 BOOLEAN IsTheSoldierAliveAndConcious( SOLDIERTYPE           *pSoldier )
00430 {
00431       if( pSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )    
00432             return(TRUE);
00433       else
00434             return(FALSE);
00435 }
00436 
00437 UINT8 NumberOfMercsOnPlayerTeam()
00438 {
00439       INT8                          cnt;
00440       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00441       INT16                         bLastTeamID;
00442       UINT8                         ubCount=0;
00443 
00444       // Set locator to first merc
00445       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00446       bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
00447 
00448   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00449       {     
00450             //if the is active, and is not a vehicle
00451             if( pSoldier->bActive && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
00452             {
00453                   ubCount++;
00454             }
00455       }
00456 
00457       return( ubCount );
00458 }
00459 
00460 
00461 void HandleMercArrivesQuotes( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00462 {
00463       INT8                                                        cnt, bHated, bLastTeamID;
00464       SOLDIERTYPE                                     *pTeamSoldier;
00465  
00466       // If we are approaching with helicopter, don't say any ( yet )
00467       if ( pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode != INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER )
00468       {
00469             // Player-generated characters issue a comment about arriving in Omerta.
00470             if ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__PLAYER_CHARACTER)
00471             {
00472                   if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_DELIVER_LETTER ] == QUESTINPROGRESS )
00473                   {
00474                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_PC_DROPPED_OMERTA );
00475                   }
00476             }
00477 
00478             // Check to see if anyone hates this merc and will now complain
00479             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00480             bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
00481             //loop though all the mercs
00482             for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
00483             {
00484                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
00485                   {
00486                         if ( pTeamSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
00487                         {
00488                               bHated = WhichHated( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile, pSoldier->ubProfile );
00489                               if ( bHated != -1 )
00490                               {
00491                                     // hates the merc who has arrived and is going to gripe about it!
00492                                     switch( bHated )
00493                                     {
00494                                           case 0:
00495                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_HATED_1_ARRIVES );
00496                                                 break;
00497                                           case 1:
00498                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_HATED_2_ARRIVES );
00499                                                 break;
00500                                           default:
00501                                                 break;
00502                                     }
00503                               }
00504                         }
00505                   }
00506             }
00507       }
00508 }

00511 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00512 void SetFlagToForceHireMerc( BOOLEAN fForceHire )
00513 {
00514       gForceHireMerc = fForceHire;
00515 }
00516 #endif

00518 
00519 UINT32 GetMercArrivalTimeOfDay( )
00520 {
00521       UINT32            uiCurrHour;
00522       UINT32            uiMinHour; 
00523 
00524       // Pick a time...
00525 
00526       // First get the current time of day.....
00527       uiCurrHour = GetWorldHour( );
00528 
00529       // Subtract the min time for any arrival....
00530       uiMinHour   = uiCurrHour + MIN_FLIGHT_PREP_TIME;
00531 
00532       // OK, first check if we need to advance a whole day's time...
00533       // See if we have missed the last flight for the day...
00534       if ( ( uiCurrHour ) > 13  ) // ( > 1:00 pm - too bad )
00535       {
00536             // 7:30 flight....
00537             return( GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( 1 ) + MERC_ARRIVE_TIME_SLOT_1 );
00538       }
00539 
00540       // Well, now we can handle flights all in one day....
00541       // Find next possible flight
00542       if ( uiMinHour <= 7 )
00543       {
00544             return( GetWorldDayInMinutes() + MERC_ARRIVE_TIME_SLOT_1 ); // 7:30 am
00545       }
00546       else if ( uiMinHour <= 13 )
00547       {
00548             return( GetWorldDayInMinutes() + MERC_ARRIVE_TIME_SLOT_2 ); // 1:30 pm
00549       }
00550       else
00551       {
00552             return( GetWorldDayInMinutes() + MERC_ARRIVE_TIME_SLOT_3 ); // 7:30 pm
00553       }
00554 }
00555 
00556 
00557 void UpdateAnyInTransitMercsWithGlobalArrivalSector( )
00558 {
00559       INT32 cnt;
00560       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00561 
00562       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00563 
00564   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
00565   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00566       {     
00567             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
00568             {     
00569                   if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) 
00570                   {
00571                         if ( pSoldier->fUseLandingZoneForArrival )
00572                         {
00573                               pSoldier->sSectorX      = gsMercArriveSectorX;
00574                               pSoldier->sSectorY      = gsMercArriveSectorY;
00575                               pSoldier->bSectorZ      = 0;
00576                         }                       
00577                   }
00578             }
00579       }
00580 }
00581 
00582 INT16 StrategicPythSpacesAway(INT16 sOrigin, INT16 sDest)
00583 {
00584       INT16 sRows,sCols,sResult;
00585 
00586       sRows = abs((sOrigin / MAP_WORLD_X) - (sDest / MAP_WORLD_X));
00587       sCols = abs((sOrigin % MAP_WORLD_X) - (sDest % MAP_WORLD_X));
00588 
00589  
00590       // apply Pythagoras's theorem for right-handed triangle:
00591       // dist^2 = rows^2 + cols^2, so use the square root to get the distance
00592       sResult = (INT16)sqrt((double)(sRows * sRows) + (sCols * sCols));
00593 
00594       return(sResult);
00595 }
00596 
00597 
00598 // ATE: This function will check if the current arrival sector
00599 // is valid
00600 // if there are enemies present, it's invalid
00601 // if so, search around for nearest non-occupied sector.
00602 void CheckForValidArrivalSector( )
00603 {
00604       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00605       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00606       INT16  cnt1, cnt2, sGoodX, sGoodY;
00607       UINT8  ubRadius = 4;
00608       INT32  leftmost;
00609       INT16  sSectorGridNo, sSectorGridNo2;
00610       INT32  uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00611       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00612       CHAR16 sString[ 1024 ];
00613       CHAR16 zShortTownIDString1[ 50 ];
00614       CHAR16 zShortTownIDString2[ 50 ];
00615 
00616       sSectorGridNo = gsMercArriveSectorX + ( MAP_WORLD_X * gsMercArriveSectorY );
00617 
00618       // Check if valid...
00619       if ( !StrategicMap[ sSectorGridNo ].fEnemyControlled )
00620       {
00621             return;
00622       }
00623 
00624       GetShortSectorString( gsMercArriveSectorX ,gsMercArriveSectorY, zShortTownIDString1 );
00625 
00626 
00627       // If here - we need to do a search!
00628       sTop        = ubRadius;
00629       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00630       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00631       sRight  = ubRadius;
00632 
00633       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00634       {
00635             leftmost = ( ( sSectorGridNo + ( MAP_WORLD_X * cnt1 ) )/ MAP_WORLD_X ) * MAP_WORLD_X;
00636 
00637             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00638             {
00639                   sSectorGridNo2 = sSectorGridNo + ( MAP_WORLD_X * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00640 
00641                   if( sSectorGridNo2 >=1 && sSectorGridNo2 < ( ( MAP_WORLD_X - 1 ) * ( MAP_WORLD_X - 1 ) ) && sSectorGridNo2 >= leftmost && sSectorGridNo2 < ( leftmost + MAP_WORLD_X ) )
00642                   {
00643                         if ( !StrategicMap[ sSectorGridNo2 ].fEnemyControlled && !StrategicMap[ sSectorGridNo2 ].fEnemyAirControlled )
00644                         {
00645                               uiRange = StrategicPythSpacesAway( sSectorGridNo2, sSectorGridNo );
00646 
00647                               if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00648                               {
00649                                     sGoodY = cnt1;
00650                                     sGoodX = cnt2;
00651                                     uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00652                                     fFound = TRUE;
00653                               }
00654                         }
00655                   }
00656             }
00657       }
00658 
00659       if ( fFound )
00660       {
00661             gsMercArriveSectorX = gsMercArriveSectorX + sGoodX;
00662             gsMercArriveSectorY = gsMercArriveSectorY + sGoodY;
00663 
00664             UpdateAnyInTransitMercsWithGlobalArrivalSector( );
00665 
00666             GetShortSectorString( gsMercArriveSectorX ,gsMercArriveSectorY, zShortTownIDString2 );
00667 
00668             swprintf( sString, L"Arrival of new recruits is being rerouted to sector %s, as scheduled drop-off point of sector %s is enemy occupied.", zShortTownIDString2, zShortTownIDString1 );
00669 
00670             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox(  sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00671 
00672       }
00673 }
